## Context & Purpose
- What is the purpose of this change?
- Briefly highlight the business or product outcome.

## Implementation & Design
- Summarize the key technical approach, models, or architecture.
- Point out any business logic, API, or user-facing adjustments.

## Impact on MVP/Product Strategy
- How does this change advance key milestones or the roadmap?
- Are there measurable metrics or proof (user signups, API calls, etc.) affected?

## How to Review/Test
- Steps for verifying success (include direct links if possible).
- Any simple "run this" instructions.

## Key Decisions & Tradeoffs
- Document major technical, UX, or product tradeoffs.
- Note why alternative solutions were rejected (short bullet points).

## Investor Notes
- If relevant: cost implications, forecast improvement, milestone for the business.
- Useful for documenting rapid iteration and KPI milestone progress.

## Checklist
- [ ] Code runs locally
- [ ] Core business logic/feature covered
- [ ] No major bugs found in manual smoke tests
- [ ] PR linked to project milestone or investor KPI

## Screenshots/Reference (optional)
- Paste or link relevant screenshots, diagrams, or Loom walkthroughs.

## Next Steps (optional)
- Note any follow-ups or open questions for future PRs.
